attributes.action: Add Staffordshire Bull Terriers to the Dangerous Dogs Act
attributes.additional_details: Bully breed and dangerous. THE AMOUNT OF DANGEROUS DOGS SEIZED OVER THE YEARS Staffordshire bull terriers were the most dangerous seized and now second to the XL bully . Ban both Bully breeds . Also Personal experience of savage attack by a staffie
attributes.background: Add Staffordshire Bull Terriers to the Dangerous Dogs Act
